metadata.title: CVE-2019-20218 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
selectExpander in select.c in SQLite 3.30.1 proceeds with WITH stackunwinding even after a parsing error.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20218` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.3
libsqlite3-0 - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.3
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.3
sqlite3 - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.22.0-1ubuntu0.3').
